creator: Slideshow Solution
descriptionHtml:
Image to Video Maker is Best Photo Slideshow Animation Maker With Favorite Music of User

Create Different Movies and Slides of Images To present Any Celebration or Occasion

App with Most Popular Features for Photo Editing and Video Making Function

Now Its Very Simple To Make Your Own Photo Slideshow Movie With Music With Your All Time Best & Favorite Festival Pictures.


Special Features :

Image To Video Movie Makes Takes User To The Next Level Photo Slideshow Experience.

There Are Many Movie Maker & Slideshow Maker Applications Available In Market , But this App Has Some Special features.

User Allows To Select Number Of Photos To Make Slideshow And Edit Each of Them Separately With Best Supporting Image Editing Tools Offers By This App

Amazing User Interface, Graphic Design & Movie Making Flow With Attractive User Experience


In-App Editing Tool :

One Of The Core & Special Part of Application That Makes User Experience For Photo Video Slideshow Much Batter.

Because this Part is A Surprise For The User Who Visiting the Application First time, Because User Simply Looks For Simple Image Slideshow theme.

User Can Re-Arrange Photos In Their Own Sequence.

Allows Different Filters , Effect On Image , Change Backgrounds.

Control Brightness , Resize & Rotate Image , Add Stickers & Text.


Other Tools :

Image To Video Maker Also Allows User To Add their Favorite Music Track in Background of Video Slideshow.

User Have To Choose Favorite Song & Also trim The Special Part of That Song if they Like

User Having Full Control On Image Slideshow Duration To Set Proper Sliding Images One by One

There Are Lots Of Frames For Video According to Event of Your Video, Apply Different Frame style over Your Video


Get Instant Preview :

Everyone Like To Demonstrate Any Product Before Finalize & Use of it, So We Provide Live Theme & All Video Preview Within App With Your Different Style Slideshow Theme

Try Many Of Available Themes & frames & Choose Your Favourite One Of them While Making Your Final Slideshow Video


How To Use APP :

- Start With Create New Video
- Select Your Favourite Photos
- Arrange & Edit Each of Your Photos
- Add Your Favourite Music For Background
- Select Time Duration For Photo Sliding
- Apply Different Frame Style & Various Themes
- See Preview & Choose Final Movie Making Theme
- Create Your Video & Share it With Social App without our permission
